data.eml:eml: A new oryzomyine (Rodentia: Sigmodontinae) from the Quaternary of Curaçao (West Indies)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zijlstra, Jelle S. (2012): A new oryzomyine (Rodentia: Sigmodontinae) from the Quaternary of Curaçao (West Indies). Zootaxa 3534: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282797
